title: Garment For Religious Statue, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade) on satin weave
description: Small tunic of yellow silk satin brocaded in silver metallic threads and polychrome silks. Neck, sleeve and hem edges trimmed with narrow silver ribbon. Open down sides and tied with strips of white silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Garment For Religious Statue, 18th century. Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade) on satin weave. 1927-18-2.
